subject: Stefan you have hit on something (EVPmaker experiment)
author: bhali333
full_text:
Stefan,

I just did a 2 minute experiment with the file you posted and EVPM.
During the session I heard several real time answers and have gotten 
about 30 seconds into the recording and have extracted 3 fantastic 
concise files with direct answers to questions.

I am posting the three files now, with more to come later.
Please e-mail me with an explination on the program, "speakjet"
my e-mail is 

paranormalinvestigating@...

I appreciate it.

Bruce
